quoteDoc: Terms of Service and License Agreement
quoteText: YOU MAY NOT CHECK MORE THAN 300 DOCUMENTS OR 150,000 WORDS IN ANY 30-DAY PERIOD OR 100 DOCUMENTS OR 50,000 WORDS IN ANY 24-HOUR PERIOD.
title: Grammarly usage restrictions

tosdr.tldr: Grammarly restricts your use to 100 documents/50,000 words within a 24-hr period and 300 documents/150,000 words per month.
